description: When a user sets up their account(s) in SEE Finance, the SCSF file is created by the program to store the data. To open an SCSF file in SEE Finance, select File â†’ Open or Open Recent to open recently opened files.
NOTE: While SCSF files are typically opened using SEE Finance in macOS, you can also open them on an iOS device using the SEE Finance mobile app.
